text:
Producer!
Since work's done, how 'bout goin' for a little stroll?

Sounds good.
Let's go out and explore...

Hehe~, in that case, leave it to me!
There's an observation deck with a breathtaking view!

The staff at the sales office recommended it!
That's what we were talkin' about.

If you were talking with the staff about it,
then maybe you can show me around.
Finally made it to the top!

Once ya see the great view, all yer fatigue will vanish!
How 'bout you, Producer?

(...So she was looking out for me.
It's no wonder an idol would worry.)

Thanks, Kogane.
I'm starting to feel better.

Hehe, that's great!
Let's keep givin' it our all startin' tomorrow, Producer!
